item.title: Installing and Setting up MQTT
item.description: Installation sudo apt update sudo apt install -y mosquitto mosquitto-clients sudo snap install mqtt-explorer Example Setup sudo cp /usr/share/doc/mosquitto/examples/mosquitto.

item.title: Looping Video into Zoom
item.description: sudo apt-get install v4l2loopback-dkms v4l-utils ls /dev/video* sudo modprobe v4l2loopback video_nr=9 card_label=“virtual-cam” ffmpeg -stream_loop -1 -re -i 2020-10-01-110554.

item.title: Installing GrapheneOS on a Pixel 4a
item.description: Instructions derived from https://grapheneos.org/install/cli Download Developer Tools sudo apt install android-sdk-platform-tools-common sudo apt install signify-openbsd alias signify=signify-openbsd sudo apt remove adb mkdir ~/adb cd ~/adb sudo apt install libarchive-tools curl -O https://dl.

item.title: Shrink a PDF from the command line
item.description: gs -sDEVICE=pdfwrite -dCompatibilityLevel=1.4 -dPDFSETTINGS=/ebook \ -dNOPAUSE -dQUIET -dBATCH -sOutputFile=output.pdf input.pdf

item.title: Visual Studio Code Setup
item.description: https://code.visualstudio.com/ download package cd Downloads sudo dpkg -i code_1.72.2-1665614327_amd64.deb sudo apt install -yf sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y Extensions Python Jupyter C/C++ pymakr docker yaml - redhat markdown
